detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in corduroy made from a cotton blend. Dungarees with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, side pockets, a decorative back pocket, and press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y). Long-sleeved top with a collar and button placket.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with frills. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps, ties at the back of the neck and an open back. Concealed zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Boxy cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Short dress in a patterned weave with an open back and buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication and a frill at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Concealed zip in one side, a gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem. Lined.
Maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits at the front. Unlined.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in a soft cotton piqué marl with notch lapels, buttons at the front and front pockets. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Long-sleeved playsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front that conceals the short legs. Detachable belt at the waist with a metal buckle covered in sparkly stones.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset, wide sides and string back. Low waist with a lace trim at the top.
High-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a concealed zip at one side and slim legs.
Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Short skirt in a light weave with a sewn-in wrapover, concealed zip in the side and wide flounced hem.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 44-53 cm.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and bottoms in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with lace-trimmed hems.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Slightly longer, straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a soft jacquard weave with notch lapels, fastening with one button at the front, and flap front pockets. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with earflaps and ties under the chin.
Straight-style, sleeveless, calf-length dress in an airy, fine knit with a lower neckline at the back. Slit at the back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric. Wide fit with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with a button.
KELZUKI x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with decorative crossover straps at the front and triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer jumper knitted in tape yarn with a slight sheen. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey.
Cardigan knitted in a cotton blend with a shawl collar, buttons down the front, side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and short sleeves.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and wrapover front with ties at the side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long earrings in patterned plastic. Length 7 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts. Top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lacing at the front.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft textured knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with elastication and gathers at the neck and short puff sleeves.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Longer jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with hole-knitted details at the cuffs and wide ribbing around the neckline.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Boots in glossy imitation leather with reversible sequins, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a crisp cotton weave with concealed elastication.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Short dress in sequined mesh with a concealed zip at the back, shoulder pads and long sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuffs. Jersey lining.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and imitation suede belt. Chest pocket with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a tab and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Bikini. Lined top with a wide flounce and narrow, double shoulder straps that join to create a braided racer back. Lined bottoms.
Satin jacket with an embroidered motif at the top and ribbed stand-up collar. Press-studs down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft pima cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulders.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave. Regular waist with smocking and a drawstring, and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Lined.
Soft, spacious shopper in imitation leather with two handles, a detachable shoulder strap and magnetic fastener at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Unlined. Size 13x40x40 cm.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with wide mesh at the front. Lined front with removable inserts, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Light support.
Maxi dress with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Double layered bodice with a lace top layer and a lined, pleated chiffon skirt.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small, frilled collar and opening at the top with a tie. Long sleeves with a tie and frill trim at the cuffs, and smocking at the hem.

Sleeveless jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif at the top (sizes 2-4Y with normal sequins). Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing around the armholes and hem.
Turtleneck body in jersey with a tear-shaped opening at the top, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a jacquard knit. Fleece-lined hat with a pompom on top, ear flaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Wide, ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high paper bag waist with a tie belt and pleats, and a zip fly. Pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs with creases.
